scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shell && npm install && cd ../dashboard-mfe && npm install && cd ../transactions-mfe && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../upload-server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.setup:db: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('db.json')){fs.copyFileSync('db.template.json','db.json');console.log('✅ db.json criado do template');}else{console.log('ℹ️ db.json já existe');}"
scripts.dev:transactions: cd transactions-mfe && npx webpack serve --mode development --port 3032
scripts.dev:all: npm run setup:db && concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:upload" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:transactions" "npm run dev:shell"
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:shell && npm run test:dashboard && npm run test:transactions
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test:shared -- --watch" "npm run test:shell -- --watch" "npm run test:dashboard -- --watch" "npm run test:transactions -- --watch"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:shared -- --coverage && npm run test:shell -- --coverage && npm run test:dashboard -- --coverage && npm run test:transactions -- --coverage
